info.name: Declutter Series - Twitter
info.description: Removes adverts and useless buttons. Faithful in style to unmodified CSS, compatible with most other themes. Part of the Declutter Series.
info.additionalInfo:
Items removed:
  • Sidebars with suggestions and trends
  • Footer
  • Twitter logo from top bar
  • Explore tab
Items changed:
  • Tweet box is sticky, remains at the top of the page when scrolling
  • Images in tweets are centered
  • Timeline is wider
  • Search box has rounded corners similar to buttons beside it
